flavorText:
"Quick, let's hide in the sewer!"
—Ginsi the Thief, now deceased

foreignData.flavorText:
„Schnell, verstecken wir uns in der Kanalisation!"
—Ginsi der Dieb, kürzlich verstorben
foreignData.name: Kanalisationskrokodil
foreignData.text: {3}{U}: Das Kanalisationskrokodil kann in diesem Zug nicht geblockt werden. Diese Fähigkeit kostet beim Aktivieren {3} weniger, falls sich in deinem Friedhof Karten mit fünf oder mehr unterschiedlichen Manabeträgen befinden.

foreignData.flavorText:
"¡Rápido, escondámonos en la alcantarilla!".
—La ladrona Ginsi, ahora fallecida
foreignData.name: Cocodrilo de alcantarilla
foreignData.text: {3}{U}: El Cocodrilo de alcantarilla no puede ser bloqueado este turno. Te cuesta {3} menos activar esta habilidad si hay cinco o más valores de maná entre las cartas de tu cementerio.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Vite, cachons-nous dans les égouts ! »
—Ginsi le voleur, décédé
foreignData.name: Crocodile des égouts
foreignData.text: {3}{U} : Le Crocodile des égouts ne peut pas être bloqué ce tour-ci. Cette capacité coûte {3} de moins à activer s'il y a au moins cinq valeurs de mana parmi les cartes de votre cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Presto, nascondiamoci nelle fogne!"
—Ginsi la Ladra, ora deceduta
foreignData.name: Coccodrillo delle Fognature
foreignData.text: {3}{U}: Il Coccodrillo delle Fognature non può essere bloccato in questo turno. Questa abilità costa {3} in meno per essere attivata se ci sono cinque o più valori di mana tra le carte nel tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText:
「急いで、下水道に隠れよう！」
——今は亡き盗人、ジンシ
foreignData.name: 下水クロコダイル
foreignData.text: {3}{U}：このターン、下水クロコダイルはブロックされない。あなたの墓地にあるすべてのカードの中に５種類以上のマナ総量があるなら、この能力を起動するためのコストは{3}少なくなる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — クロコダイル

foreignData.flavorText:
"어서, 하수구에 숨자고!"
—이제는 고인이 된, 도둑 진시
foreignData.name: 하수구 악어
foreignData.text: {3}{U}: 하수구 악어는 이 턴에 방어될 수 없다. 이 능력은 당신의 무덤에 있는 카드들의 마나 값이 다섯 종류 이상이라면 활성화하는 데 {3}이 덜 든다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Rápido, vamos nos esconder no esgoto!"
— Ginsi, a Ladra, finada
foreignData.name: Crocodilo do Esgoto
foreignData.text: {3}{U}: Crocodilo do Esgoto não pode ser bloqueado neste turno. Esta habilidade custará {3} a menos para ser ativada se houver cinco ou mais valores de mana diferentes entre os cards em seu cemitério.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Скорее, спрячемся в канализации!»
— воровка Джинси, ныне покойная
foreignData.name: Сточный Крокодил
foreignData.text: {3}{U}: Сточный Крокодил не может быть заблокирован в этом ходу. Активация этой способности стоит на {3} меньше, если среди карт на вашем кладбище есть не менее пяти разных значений мановой ценности.

foreignData.flavorText:
「快，我们躲到下水道去！」
～盗贼金曦，喊于生前
foreignData.name: 下水道鳄鱼
foreignData.text: {3}{U}：下水道鳄鱼本回合不能被阻挡。如果你坟墓场中牌的法术力值有五种或更多，则此异能减少{3}来起动。

foreignData.flavorText:
「快，我們躲到下水道去！」
～盜賊金曦，喊於生前
foreignData.name: 下水道鱷魚
foreignData.text: {3}{U}：下水道鱷魚本回合不能被阻擋。如果你墳墓場中牌的魔法力值有五種或更多，則此異能減少{3}來起動。

name: Sewer Crocodile
originalText: {3}{U}: Sewer Crocodile can't be blocked this turn. This ability costs {3} less to activate if there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Costs to activate an ability are determined only once, before mana abilities are activated. If cards are removed from your graveyard after that point, such as by exiling Jack-o'-Lantern from your graveyard to pay for its mana ability, this won't affect the cost of activating Sewer Crocodile, even if that reduces the number of mana values in your graveyard to below five.
“Five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard” means there are at least five different mana values among those cards.
The mana value of a split card in the graveyard is the total mana value of both halves of that card. It does not have two mana values.
The mana value of a double-faced card in your graveyard is always the mana value of the front face.
X is 0 when determining the mana value of a card in your graveyard.
The mana value of a land card is 0.

text: {3}{U}: Sewer Crocodile can't be blocked this turn. This ability costs {3} less to activate if there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.
